mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.user_email, u.user_password, u.user_nickname, u.user_category1, u.user_address, u.user_point, u.user_trust_score, u.user_category2, u.user_category3, u.user_address_detail, u.user_status, ui.buy_count, ui.sell_count, ai.success_bid_count from tbl_user u LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE used_item_buyer_id = #{userId}) AS buy_count, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND used_item_buyer_id IS NOT NULL) AS sell_count FROM tbl_used_item GROUP BY user_id ) ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS success_bid_count FROM tbl_auction_item WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND auction_item_status = '203' GROUP BY user_id ) ai ON u.user_id = ai.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} and u.user_status = 'Y'
mapper.delete: /* 회원 탈퇴 */ delete from tbl_user where user_id = #{userId}
